alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 2:08AM PST until December 09 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches with highest accumulations from Ritzville north to Wilbur and Republic. * WHERE...Sherman Pass, Coulee City, Creston, Grand Coulee, Wilbur, Ritzville, Odessa, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Republic, Boulder Creek Road, Harrington, Inchelium, and Chesaw Road. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
